title: New Ahri is sooooooooooo good. Any mid laners you think are op now or still?
body:
New Ahri is shittonnes better. She is my new favourite champion.

What mid laners have you guys been wrecking with lately?

replies.body:
Yeah she is. Expect a nerf hammer to smack her soon. Since her changes she has like the 2nd highest winrate now.

Edit: and there it is. Q mana cost increase. W damage and range decrease.

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qK08N8ZA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-02T23:58:27.958+0000)
>
> Yeah she is. Expect a nerf hammer to smack her soon. Since her changes she has like the 2nd highest winrate now.
> 
> Edit: and there it is. Q mana cost increase. W damage and range decrease.

Wait you're talking about Ahri? Pls no :'(

> [{quoted}](name=FilAmOzNoob,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qK08N8ZA,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-02-03T00:13:30.419+0000)
>
> Wait you're talking about Ahri? Pls no :'(

Are they gonna leave us ANY mid laners omggg
Did you just reply to yourself....

> [{quoted}](name=NigguhDamus,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qK08N8ZA,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2015-02-03T02:59:21.711+0000)
>
> Did you just reply to yourself....

I think I might've :/ LOL

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qK08N8ZA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-02T23:58:27.958+0000)
>
> Yeah she is. Expect a nerf hammer to smack her soon. Since her changes she has like the 2nd highest winrate now.
> 
> Edit: and there it is. Q mana cost increase. W damage and range decrease.

So she'll be even more useless than Xerath.. lol

Swain leaves a trail of death and destruction where ever he goes- now that DFG is gone, most mages are generally weaker. So the Raven-man can destroy mid-laners with ease.

Plus, he's a bird. So you can say after each kill "Did you go to KFC? 'cos you just got a mouthful of wings!" *Badum Tss*

> [{quoted}](name=Anserem,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qK08N8ZA,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-02-03T03:41:46.914+0000)
>
> Swain leaves a trail of death and destruction where ever he goes- now that DFG is gone, most mages are generally weaker. So the Raven-man can destroy mid-laners with ease.
> 
> Plus, he's a bird. So you can say after each kill "Did you go to KFC? 'cos you just got a mouthful of wings!" *Badum Tss*

Does Swain have a lot of AOE?

> [{quoted}](name=FilAmOzNoob,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qK08N8ZA,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-02-03T05:51:05.691+0000)
>
> Does Swain have a lot of AOE?

His W is an AOE root, and his Ultimate can send out up to 3 ravens at enemies in his vicinity. However, he still has a pretty bad wave-clear.
she's getting a nerf, it's on PBE already

> [{quoted}](name=Strider Hiryu,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qK08N8ZA,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-02-03T03:51:18.786+0000)
>
> she's getting a nerf, it's on PBE already

pls no :'( Nothing on pbe is set in stone though right? :'( She's not op at all :/

> [{quoted}](name=Fog,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qK08N8ZA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-02T23:51:49.246+0000)
>
> {{item:3165}} {{item:3100}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3135}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3257}} {{champion:22}} {{summoner:2}} {{summoner:4}}

Wait.... She has AP ratios?! O.o
Just play someone who you think needs buffing and get really good at them so you only have to fear** getting better at them.**

> [{quoted}](name=Slim Chaedi,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qK08N8ZA,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-02-03T00:46:17.892+0000)
>
> Just play someone who you think needs buffing and get really good at them so you only have to fear** getting better at them.**

Hahaha thats great xD

> [{quoted}](name=Knuuckles,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qK08N8ZA,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-02-03T00:15:17.011+0000)

> veigar is still freelo

not a big fan... kind of a niche pick and he isn't very versatile.
